application.doc: Authentication and Context based access configuration for a reverse proxy instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: POST
method.id: Authentication and Context based access configuration for a reverse proxy instance
method.doc: This RESTful web service is used to add protocol specific configuration to an existing reverse proxy instance for use with the advanced access control authenticaiton and context based access service. The reverse proxy configuration file is modified, a new junction (Default is /mga) is configured, and ACLs are created and attached.
The HTTP-Tag-Value attribute will be added to the junction object to propagate the user_session_id to the runtime.

request.doc:
POST https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy/{instance_id}/authsvc_config
POST_DATA: { "hostname":"127.0.0.1", "port":"443", "username":"easuser", "password":"passw0rd", "junction":"/mga" }
cURL example:
curl -vv -k --user admin:xxxxx -H 'Accept: application/json' -H 'Content-type: application/json' https://isam.host/wga/reverseproxy/default/authsvc_config -d ' { "hostname":"127.0.0.1", "port":"443", "username":"easuser", "password":"passw0rd", "junction":"/mga" }'

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: port
param.doc: The port of the runtime. Must be the SSL port.

param.name: username
param.doc: The username used to authenticate with the runtime.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password used to authenticate with the runtime.

param.name: reuse_certs
param.doc: If the SSL certificate has already been saved, this flag indicates that the certificate should be reused instead of overwritten. Default is false.

param.name: reuse_acls
param.doc: A flag to indicate that any existing ACLs with the same name should be reused. If they are not reused, they will be replaced. Default is false .

param.name: junction
param.doc: Junction point to create. Default is /mga

param.name: load_certificate
param.doc: Determines whether the certificate is loaded automatically from the runtime server, or whether it needs to be manually added to the WebSEAL key file. Default is true.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
